origin_dialogue: ...the Milkman...
...those little green cops...

...those Bermuda Triangle sharks
...all them haters...
...Hernando...

...the pelicans...
...the squirrels...

...those eggheads in their ivory tower...
...that guy with the eye patch...
...the psychowhatsits...
...the freaky hunchback girl who loves brains so much...
...the dairy industry...
...the kid with the goggles...
...the dog track regulators...
...the tuna canneries...

...big oil...
...organized labor...
...the rodeo clown cartel...
...the media...
...the cows...

...the intelligencia...
...the fluoride producers
...a secret doomsday cult...

...my first cat Seymour...
...one of my nostril hairs...
...the intelligence community...
...the five richest families in the country...
...all those stupid crows...
...some sort of power, you know...
...or else, maybe...
...no, no, wait. I mean...
...in conjunction with...
...with the full blessing of...
...with the backing of...
...who are merely the pawns of...
...who are the puppet masters of...
...went to the prom with...
...ate a whole jar of olives with...

...sold their soul to...
...are controlled by...
...bought votes to protect...
...are doing the dirty work of...
...got in bed with...
...signed a secret treaty with...
...has been officially linked with...
...know the truth.
...won't stop visiting me.
...keep sparring with me.
...have been spitting on me all day.
...do this horrible thing, but in conjunction with who? Or whom?
...are crawling all over my skin.
...bit me all night so I couldn't sleep.
...have everyone fooled.
...were digging away at the plastics.
...were dialing in through the optics.
...stole my theories and reprinted them incorrectly, to discredit them.
...are not to be trusted.
...have been living off the teat of the dairy industry.
...have been fixing oil prices...
...assassinated the one man in their way...
...pretty much control everything.
...pick who lives and who dies and what the football scores are going to be every week.
...and they obviously...
...and I know they...
...but they can't hide that they...
...ha! Like I don't know that they...
...and, let's just say for now that they...
...and, if I know anything, I know that they...
...and sure as the nose on my face, I am sure they...
...to get ...
...because they want ...
...in order to monopolize...
...to keep down...
...so the people never find out about...
...and who wins? Them. Who loses?
...all in a big fight over...
...the truth.
...all of us.
...the whole sack of lies.
...the innocents.
...the biggest conspiracy of all.
...the infrastructure.
...the lap belt, man.
...the water supply.
...the rotundra.
...the A.M. tenderizer.
...last specimen of the super-virus.
...the witnesses.
...my hooch.
...the hanging udders.
...a clean-burning, perpetual energy source.
...a religious artifact with supposedly unimaginable powers.
...exactly what, nobody knows.
How long do they think they can hide that?
I mean, who do they think they're fooling?
Can I really be the only person who sees this?
Someone has to get this information to the people.
If they find out I know this stuff, I'm dead.
Oh, man. This stuff is hot.
...since the year dot.
...right under people's noses!
...and nobody seems to care!
Visiting hours are over!
Why does that hydrant keep looking at me?
You can pass it over the counter, but that don't make it over the counter!
No insubordination, right boss? Right?
Okay, Boss?
Hey, where is the boss?
Ignore it, Cooper!
I have to get rid of some of this stuff!
I have to stay focused.
No distractions!
What???
Oh, that doesn't fit. That doesn't fit at all.
Well, maybe if I forget about that other part.
Wait, why did I say that?
Oh, Boyd. You've got this all wrong.
Did I just think that? Or did someone MAKE me think it?
But when that happens, they turn it into CHOCOLATE milk, and nobody can tell the difference!
You know what I mean? Amounts tendered? Yeah?
The squirrels... have eyes.
Listen to me, listen to me, LISTEN TO ME!
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UP!
Shhh! No, wait. Say that again?
They think the windows are tinted, but they ain't tinted nearly enough!
Of course the milk's got spider webs in it! Taste it!
I scream, you scream, we all scream, we all scream...
The ice cream's in the web, the web is in the cream.
Oh, you think that's regular yarn, do you?
They come, they whisper, they watch, they chop, chop, chop.
What's that on your head? That's no hat. Maybe you could tell your hat to shut up? Or at least, ask me the right questions?
I wonder if I'm on camera right now. Ha! What, am I crazy? Of course I am!
Hi mom! Look at me! I'm tangled in a web of deception! How's uncle G?
G-man, who are you working for? Who is G?
G-Man, Go-man, Goat Man I thought you worked for me?
My father, he was a good man, but he served a cruel master.
Mom, are you sure these are your children?
These are not my dot to dots. These are not my babies.
...but of course you know all this because you're Australian...
...and then it comes out of those wires over there, and goes straight into my head, with all its little audio tricks
I don't want to be a lead weight on the table.
I see myself more as a turtle with a rocket strapped to its back!
...and he waits and he waits...
...this milk can't stay fresh forever...
...something's got to give...
How many are there? I count fourteen, but that's not the number on my hand, that's not the number on my neck.
The truth lives in a small house on the edge of town.
The truth is sleeping in glass box.
The truth is a colorful diamond.
I'm dropping out of this yogurt convention. There's no fruit at the bottom.
Hey! Lady! Where you going with that sweater?
Think you could get this past me? I'm the guard.
I've got the truth. It's tucked in my cheeks. I'm not going to eat it right now.
Are you buying? Or are you spying?
This is ugly. It's like a Cyclops with a million eyes!
The fire will start in menswear!
But what if the signal comes early?
The meaty bit in the middle of this won ton, it's me!
Hey, don't worry about me. I'm centered. I'm the whole center in fact.
Am I? Or is he? Am I he? What is he doing in my house?
Someone moved into my neighborhood, uninvited.
The housing committee's not going to like this.
They should paint their garage door the same color as everybody else's.
I'm locked on the outside, and I'm locked on the inside.
And the little girl stuck her finger in the dyke and saved all the windmills. But who does the little girl work for?
Hey, little girl! Get your finger out of there!
Ha! I know what you're up to.
You've got the skates, but I've got the key!
Who is the Milkman???
You know my house is clean, right? Right boss??
Get off of me!
I don't want any half and half! I'm already half and half!!
If I'm invisible, then why is everyone looking at me?
...heh heh.
...wait...
...uhhhh...
...hmmmm...
...yeah, yeah, yeah...
...no, no, no, no...
...okay, okay, but
...riiiiiiight...
What have you done?
translated_dialogue: แกทำอะไรลงไป?

origin_dialogue: He wakes!
translated_dialogue: เขาตื่นแล้ว!

origin_dialogue: I am the Milkman. My milk is delicious.
translated_dialogue: ฉันคือคนส่งนม นมของฉันอร่อย

origin_dialogue: And the sea shall run white (cough cough) with his rage
translated_dialogue: และท้องทะเลจะต้องขาวโพลน (ไอ ไอ) ด้วยความโกรธเกรี้ยวของเขา

origin_dialogue: Ooooh ohhhh.
translated_dialogue: Ooooh ohhhh.

origin_dialogue: Special delivery today.
translated_dialogue: วันนี้จัดส่งแบบพิเศษ

origin_dialogue: GRAAAAAA!
translated_dialogue: GRAAAAAA!

origin_dialogue: Boyd? Are you okay?
translated_dialogue: บอยด์ นายโอเคไหม?

origin_dialogue: Time for the final delivery to this address.
translated_dialogue: ถึงเวลาจัดส่งครั้งสุดท้ายในที่อยู่นี่แล้ว

origin_dialogue: Hey, is that milk regular kind, or the exploding dream kind?
translated_dialogue: เฮ้ นมนั่น นมธรรมดาหรือว่านมระเบิดฝันล่ะ?

origin_dialogue: It's fortified with what the world wants, what the world deserves.
translated_dialogue: มันเสริมด้วยสิ่งที่โลกต้องการ สิ่งที่โลกสมควรได้รับ

origin_dialogue: Are you sure don't want to just talk about this, Boyd?
translated_dialogue: นายแน่ใจนะว่าไม่อยากคุยเรื่องนี้กันก่อนน่ะ บอยด์?

origin_dialogue: I told you not to follow. Now you must die!
translated_dialogue: ฉันบอกเธอแล้วว่าอย่าตามมา. ตอนนี้ เธอ ต้อง ตาย!

origin_dialogue: But--
translated_dialogue: แต่--

origin_dialogue: THAT IS THE WAY OF THE RAINBOW SQUIRTS!!!
translated_dialogue: นั่นคือวิถีของเนตรนารีสายรุ้ง!!!

origin_dialogue: Ah ha!
translated_dialogue: Ah ha!

origin_dialogue: Oh, hello there. Have you come to pay for your Rainbow Treats? We knew you would.
translated_dialogue: โอ้ สวัสดีจ๊ะ หนูจ่ายเงินค่าขนมสายรุ้งหรือยังจ๊ะ? เรารู้ว่าหนูต้องมา

origin_dialogue: Won't you join us in our Rainbow Squirt Pledge of Purpose?
translated_dialogue: หนูจะมาเข้าร่วมในคำปฏิญาณเนตรนารีสายรุ้งกับเราไหม?

origin_dialogue: To Promote Niceness.
To Make the World Prettier.
To Share Candy With Everyone.
To Obfuscate the True Nature of the Milkman.
To protect the Milkman at all costs.
You brought them here!
translated_dialogue: แกพาพวกมันมาที่นี่!

origin_dialogue: To Destroy All Who Would Harm the Milkman, or Threaten to Reveal His Secret Objective.
Go girls! Protect the milk!
translated_dialogue: ไปสาวๆ ปกป้องนม!

origin_dialogue: Do not follow! The milk is not ready, and you are not ready for the milk!
translated_dialogue: อย่าตามมานะ! นมยังไม่พร้อม และแกก็ยังไม่พร้อมสำหรับนม!

origin_dialogue: Hi-ya!
translated_dialogue: Hi-ya!

origin_dialogue: Haaa!
Hruuuh!
Cha!
Eyyyah!
Rainbow squirts do not negotiate!
Eat yarn!
To Protect the Milkman at all Costs.
Must make... final... delivery.
My milk... is... delicious.
People... gotta... have their milk.
Milk will get warm. Milk is a drink best served cold!
Rrrrr!
Grrrr!
It's perfect, isn't it?
Yes.
Almost complete. Just a few missing pieces.
Yes. Now which piece talks about the Milkman? The one who opens the asylum gate?
But it's ALL about the Milkman, can't you see?
Is this like one of those 3D paintings? I can never do those.
No, you just gotta learn to see it like I see it!
There's something in the fridge that might help you see the world like I do.
Oooh, sorry. I don't drink--before noon, I mean.
Did you say the Milkman was in the fridge?
Use the leftovers in the fridge to see what I see!
The Milkman's dead??? Ah crud.
Burned up in a department store fire. Didn't you hear?
...Is he dead or not?
Where is the Milkman?
Well, he's NOT in the graveyard, so that's the first place you should look.
I'd go down there myself, but I can't get in.
Operatives. Optics. Occularities.
Everywhere.
Be careful! They're watching. All the time.
Kay...
Now, how am I going to find some creepy graveyard in this... nice, normal, neighborhood?
You know, I think instead of Boyd, I'm gonna call you "Roid," because your such a big pain in my butt.
At least that's what the media would have you believe.
Go to the graveyard! Dig him up! Oh, you'll find something all right, but it's neither man nor milk.
Hey, uh... where's the door?
On the front... like most refrigerators.
Alright, time to see the world as Boyd sees it.
Okay, so, where's the Milkman?
If you could see what I see, then you wouldn't be asking that question.
How do I get through the sewers?
Have you been to the post office yet? Maybe you could take a correspondence course.
Being an assassin is hard.
You have to keep your guard up at all times. You gotta be like a turtle with a rocket strapped to his back, you know?
Okay, I went to the Book Depository, and all that happened was a little girl jumped out a window. It was kind of depressing, actually.
Did you talk to the birds up there? Did you ask them if they saw anything with their electric eyes?
Hey, I found the Milkman.
Big deal. I knew where he was the whole time. Getting past the red head, that's the problem.
Stop.
Caution, men working.
Dangerous conditions ahead.
The road is out, and we are working on it.
No pedestrian traffic allowed.
It is very hot here, working on the road.
Not a through street.
My red sign helps me work on the road.
No ped xing.
Slow to 15 mph.
I work on the road crew.
Thank goodness it is Friday.
Being on a road crew is arduous, but rewarding.
Look at that woman's breasts. They're large.
I cannot wait until the next payday.
Boo hoo.
Oh boo hoo.
Boo hoo hoo.
I am sad.
I am a sad widow.
I wish my loved one was not dead, but alive.
I am alone now, and grieving.
I do not know whether to remarry, or to remain loyal to my loved one.
Why, god, why?
These flowers are a token of my remembrance for my loved one.
I wish my loved one had remembered to indicate me as the beneficiary of his 401(k) plan.
The cemetery is filled with dead people.
The dead people are under ground, and I have brought flowers, because I am sad.
I am trimming this hedge.
Hedges become unruly over time, and need to be trimmed.
These are my hedge trimmers. They help me maintain my hedge.
I take pride in my well-landscaped yard.
My good landscaping adds to the property value of the entire neighborhood.
Cutting the bush does not hurt it.
I wear sunscreen while cutting hedges to prevent melanomas from forming on my skin.
This part of the hedge is too tall.
I take frequent breaks to avoid carpal tunnel syndrome.
I am making a pie.
This is my house and I am responsible for its upkeep.
This rolling pin is a tool I use to make pies.
Pies are delicious.
Over time, my husband will desire me less sexually, but he will always enjoy my pies.
It is important not to use too much pressure when rolling out a pie crust.
When my husband drinks excessively, I may threaten him with this rolling pin, though we still love each other very much.
I am famous for my pie-making abilities.
Children and adults both like to eat pies.
Pies come in many flavors.
Cherry is a flavor of pie.
Apple pies are very popular.
Though I do not receive a paycheck, I consider my homemaking to be my occupation.
Rhubarb is a controversial pie variety.
For the last several years, I have relied on prescription medication to make it through the days.
Pie crusts should be rolled outward, from the center.
We work in the sewer.
The sewer carries human waste.
The sewer is very important, and we are responsible for its upkeep.
I am a waste management technician.
I need to prevent blockages, and this device is one of my tools.
Sewers are full of rats.
The most pleasant sewers can be found in Paris, France.
This job is unsavory, but it must be performed by someone.
Due to illegal disposal of hazardous materials, sewer water is often highly radioactive.
There are no documented cases of alligators found alive in sewers.
Though I often smell of excrement, I deserve your respect because I provide a valuable service.
Feces.
I am fixing the telephone lines.
This is my job, to work on the phone lines.
I have a special phone.
Hello?
Testing, testing. One, two, three.
Can you hear me?
Is there anyone on the line?
Operator?
I can listen to any phone conversation that I want, but do not because of my sense of professional responsibility.
Someday, the popularity of mobile phones will make my job obsolete.
I can climb telephone poles.
I am an assassin.
My gun is clean.
I am in charge of assassinating important figures.
I am found on rooftops, in clock towers and book depositories.
I do not kill out of passion, but for money.
This is my gun.
Sometimes I work for the government.
I like to shoot people.
My motivations are clear only to myself.
Adjustments need to be made when firing in the wind.
I am watering.
Water is important.
Without water, these plants would die.
This is my watering can. I use it on the plants to water them.
Plants need to have water poured on them because they  have no hands to hold glasses of water.
I enjoy watering.
It is a good day for watering plants.
Hello fellow road crew worker! Welcome to the road crew.
Ah, I see that you are grieving. I will give you your space.
I am glad you are here, to help me trim these hedges.
Hello! Welcome to my house. Please stay and make pie. My stories are about to come on.
Hello sewer worker. I think I met you at the union meeting.
Come work on the phone lines with us.
Watch out, fellow assassin. There seems to be someone shooting at us from that tower.
That is a fine watering can. May I ask how much you paid for it?
Stop.  Road crew workers only beyond the yellow line.
You guys are road crew workers?
Yes. We work on the road with these red signs.
I see. Well, do you guys know where the Milkman is?
Why do you ask that question?
Are you the Milkman?
Do I look like a milkman to you?
That information is restricted to the road crew.
Please move along.
Stop! This is a restricted area!
Initiating arrest sequence!
You are not on the road crew!
You have no flowers!
The hedge area is only for those who trim hedges.
Get out of my house!
Sewer workers only!
Only phone company employees may approach the pole!
Assassins and their invited guests only!
You can't fool us! You have no water!
Come with us.
Who are you?
Who do you work for?
Why are you here?
Why are you looking for the Milkman?
What is the purpose of the goggles?
Who is the Milkman?
How old are you?
Where were you born?
What's your favorite color?
What is the Milkman's location?
What is the mission of the Milkman?
What is your relation to Cooper?
What was in Cooper's fridge?
Are you, or have you ever been, a member of the Rainbow Squirts?
Do you serve the Milkman?
How many fingers am I holding up?
How long have you been working for the Dairy industry?
Why are you wearing gloves?
How much are they paying you?
Did you burn down the department store?
What's in the milk?
Who do you think you're fooling?
We know who's paying you.
Do you look down on sewer workers?
Are you aware you're being followed?
What's the Milkman like? Is he nice in person?
Why did you burn that bush?
Why did you punch that little girl?
How did you move that trash can?
Where did you get the red sign?
What did the Rainbow Squirt tell you?
What happened inside that house?
Are you addicted to getting arrested?
Why did you want to get in the sewers?
Hello, sir. I am a Rainbow Squirt. Would you like to buy a box of my delicious Rainbow Treats?
I would buy some cookies... but I don't have any... MILK.
Do you have any idea where I could buy some... MILK? For my... COOKIES?
Ahh! Creepy man!
Excuse me, but I'm looking for the Milkman.
Stop talking to me! You're going to get me in trouble!
(whisper whisper)
Coming!
Be right there!
Just a minute!
Gosh, I sure hope someone is there this time.
It better not be that creepy guy again.
Whoooooo is it?
Sorry, no solicitors!
My mother isn't home. I'm not allowed to let in strangers.
Rainbow Squirts only.
My mom is in the shower and says you can't come in.
No boys allowed.
We're out of cookies! Come again later!
Beat it! Please.
Stop bothering us or I'll call the police!
Anyone out there?
Hellooooooo?
Huh.
What were you doing in the cemetery?
Are you a grieving widow?
Where are your flowers?
What did you find in the mausoleum?
Did you take anything?
That book you found was dynamite! Blows the whole thing wide open.
It does?
Yes! I knew it! I was completely wrong about everything! But now I've got it!
That book came from the Book Depository.
They must want to make us think that's where they want us to go, because they think we'll think we know they know we know, so we won't go!
So I shouldn't go to the Book Depository?
Of course you're going to the Book Depository! Take the sewers. Watch out for watchers. And radioactives. And perpetrators! Some of those sewer workers are involved, I think.
You'll need one of these...
Now we're talking!
It's fake. It will help you fit in around the other assassins.
Assassins? Wait a second--
Beware the cows. Not all milk is enriched.
They got Freddy! Poor Freddy. He was such a good secret agent.
I mean, assassin. Who is shooting at us?
I am on the road crew. This is my stop sign.
I am a grieving widow.
I like to trim hedges.
I work in the sewers.
I am a skilled phone repairer.
It's fake. I'm worried the other assassins are going to make fun of me.
I'm watering!
Ah! I'm telling you! I don't know where the Milkman is!
Ah! They've come for me! They are taking me away!
Wait a minute. I think there might not be a conspiracy after all. It's possible I am suffering from paranoid delusions, linked to an entity I call "the Milkman" who is, in actuality...
...the mummified remains of Abraham Lincoln!
Oh, no! It's happening again!
Spontaneous combustion! From the government LSD tests!
Whew!
Are these a clue?
Flowers to put on the grave of the truth, for those who mourn the loss of democracy!
Hey, phone's for you.
Ahh! Get that away from me! I never talk on the phone. That's how they get your location!
Look at this plunger I found in the basement of the post office.
Gah! That's the exact model they used to kill the ambassador with in '63!
STOP being crazy and tell me where the Milkman is.
You think I'm crazy? What if I'm the only one who's sane?
Is this yours?
No. I don't trust pies.
Do you have a real one of these? Like the kind that shoots bullets?
Give a loaded gun to a 10 year old? Do I look crazy to you?
Hey, take off your hat and I'll give your bangs a little touch up with these.
Ha ha. Nice attempt to get my hat. Anyway, I took the microfilm out of there days ago.
Look what I found.
Shh! It may be bugged!
Ah! Get it off me! Black death!
Hey, are you following me?
I don't want to throw that away!
I don't want to mail that. I don't want to mail anything in this creepy mailbox.
Why don't you come in here and do that, tough guy?
Hey, I'm just going to walk through okay?
Sorry, we widows are busy grieving in here.
Please stay back. There is a severe electrocution danger.
The sewers are not safe for civilians. And... they smell very bad.
Sorry. Road Crew only.
This is my home, not Grand Central Station. Get out!
Ha ha. Do you not realize that we are deadly assassins? Are you not afraid?
I cannot let someone near my hedges who has not been properly trained in the use of the trimmers.
Unless you have water for my plants, then we have no use for you in here.
Ohhhhh... ohhhh... whoa, whoa... ohhh.
Why am I in a grave yard? Am I dead?
Who is this? Why did you call me?
What am I doing in this smelly sewer? Disgusting!
What am I doing out here with this strange paddle in my hand?
What's this? I hate pie!
Oh my god. Why do I have a gun in my hand? I hope I didn't kill again.
Why am I trimming hedges? I pay a gardener good money to do this for me.
Okay I have to think. Do this watering can and I have a history?
I should be out trying to find the Milkman!
Oh yeah. That's right. Disguise. Ahem.
Please. Sir. We have infrared vision.
I am on fire. I am uncomfortable. Initiating countermeasures.
Ahhhh!
I am sorry for your loss.
I am your sister in grief.
Yes. You should be over there, working on the phone lines.
Glad to have you here on the job.
Gross. What a terrible job that must be. I would never let you date my daughter.
As do I. We must stick together against those who would judge us.
We have no use for road work here.
Yes, we are all on the road crew. Our backs are killing us.
I hope it is rhubarb pie because that is my favorite.
I like all pies except for rhubarb. Do you know that rhubarb is poisonous in large quantities?
I hope you are not trying to steal my husband, tramp.
You are a cold-blooded killer. But it takes all kinds to make a world.
Shhh! Don't broadcast that fact. They look real.
Why don't you go do that, then? Somewhere else.
It is a good day for that activity you mention. Please join me.
That is a fine vocation. You should practice it near some flowers.
Me too! Perhaps we can swap watering tips.
Please do not do that.
Who is the Crow?
Who does the Crow work for?
What is the mission of the Crow?
Ow! I'm only trying to make money for our organization, sir!
Let me down or I'll scream for the police!
Ohhhhh Ohhhhhhhh... Ohhhhhh
Ahhhh! I'm on fire! Owwwwwww!
That's nice... creep.
Hee hee hee!
Creep.
The vines are too thick! They won't break.
Hm. This must be the Milkman's grave.
...But it's completely overgrown with vines.  How am I going to get in there?
Can't get a good grip.
Well, at least they're confused.
Yes! Burn!
Man, I hope no one notices all this fire.
Who's in there?
Burrrrn!
Gah!
Hey, come out of there. I have some flowers for you.
Excuse me, you in the car. Phone's for you. Why don't you come out and get it?
Hey, you in the car. Free plunger. Gotta come out to get it.
Hey, you in the car! Stop! And exit the vehicle please.
Alright, come out of the car right now or I will roll this all over your hood.
Okay, come out of the car right now or I'll shoot!
I'm going to take these hedge clippers and scratch the heck out of that car if you don't show your faces right now.
Hey, looks like you're overheating. Why don't you come out so I can give you this water for your engine?
Hey, can I come in and look around? I want to see the view from your helicopter!
Whoops.
I'm not close enough to use Clairvoyance. I need to get up higher!
Stop, helicopter! Land and let me in! I want to see the view from up there please!
Hey, you in the helicopter! I've got a--oh they don't care.
I have a feeling that didn't mean much to them.
Ha! I've hacked it! This will work for sure!
Rats.
Ah ha! That should fry the circuitry and allow me--
I could use that, but I should probably just use my finger.
Well, if that didn't work then I am completely out of ideas.
Hi-ya!
Hy-yup!
God's Eye!
I made this myself!
Deadly Rainbow Crafts!
Have some cookies!
Treats for you!
This box is free!
Ha!
No milk for you!
Die!
HA HA HA!
BWAH HA HA HA!
Ah ha ha ha!
Enough! It's time for me to pluck out your eyes!
Ha! You can't. THAT is the purpose of the goggles!
Fine. Then I'll do this.
Hope you can see in the dark.
Because I can! HA HA HA HA!
Over here!
I can see you!
Ah!
Ooh!
Gak!
Lucky shot!
How did you know where I was?
Must have heard me breathing.
How can he see in the dark?
Hey, how about your Milkman friend just opens the gates to the asylum for me, then he could crawl right back in the fridge afterwards!
When he wakes there will be no afterwards!
Ohhhh... oh
I know you're in here somewhere!
Ha ha ha! Nice try!
I bought you these as a peace offering!
All who disturb the Milkman must die!!!
Hey, it's the little girls on the phone. They need you upstairs right now!
They can handle themselves. So can I.
Don't make me use this!
Enough distractions. Time to die!
Stop! Stop jumping around and throwing things!
I will if you will. And then you will die!
I'm going to flatten you with this thing.
I'd like to see you try!
Freeze!
Ha! That is the fakest-looking gun I've ever seen!
That hair is coming off lady!
Try it and die! Die quicker, I mean!
I hope you have a towel, cuz my can is full of water.
Your can is going to be full of yarn in a second!
No time for laughter! Prepare to die!
Freeze! Don't come any closer!
I'll never tell you the location of the Milkman. Never!
Okay, let's all just settle down and talk--
Where is the Milkman?
Who is the Milkman?
What is the mission of the Milkman?
Co... uh... come closer (cough) and (cough) I--I'll tell you (cough).
Glad I never bought any of those.
Hm. The view from up here is pretty good, but I still can't see enough.
I need a way to get even higher!
Like, super high! As if I were flying!
I KNOW! Maybe I could find some stilts!
I am a helicopter pilot.
I like to fly helicopters.
We are looking for the Milkman.
We don't know where he is.
Helicopters can go up and down.
Man, these guys are dumb.
Hey, wait. What's that? I'll bet that's him!
The Milkman!
Helicopters move sideways too, but not as fast as planes.
He's on that remote island over there.
What the heck is that sound?
Hello?
Boyd? Is this you? I think I found the Milkman!
I have no idea what you're talking about. Who is this?
Okay, from now on your name isn't Boyd. It's "Roid." Because you're such a big pain in my butt.
If you see a lady tossing her cookies, run away!
I don't want to hurt the cameras. They're my only chance of seeing how to get through this basement.
Hey, you're alive! Why did you jump out that window?
Sir I have no idea what you are talking about. Maybe you are thinking of someone else.
Say, would you be interested in some...
...cookies?
Ahhh!
Boyd?
Hey, Boyd. Why are you trying to burn down the asylum?
I am the Milkman.
My employer has commissioned me to deliver this milk, to whitewash what went on here.
I make sure no evidence is left of anything, except for milk.
I cannot rest until I have made my final delivery.
Ooooh ohhhh.
translated_dialogue: Ooooh ohhhh.

origin_dialogue: To Share Candy With Everyone.
translated_dialogue: เพื่อแบ่งปันขนมกับทุกคน

origin_dialogue: To Obfuscate the True Nature of the Milkman.
translated_dialogue: เพื่อปกปิดธรรมชาติที่แท้จริงของคนส่งนม

origin_dialogue: To protect the Milkman at all costs.
translated_dialogue: เพื่อปกป้องคนส่งนมอย่างสุดใจ

origin_dialogue: To Destroy All Who Would Harm the Milkman, or Threaten to Reveal His Secret Objective.
translated_dialogue: เพื่อทำลายล้างทุกคนที่คิดจะทำร้ายคนส่งนม หรือพยายามเปิดเผยเป้าหมายลับของเขา

origin_dialogue: Aiiiiiieee!
To Promote Niceness.
translated_dialogue: เพื่อส่งเสริมความดี

origin_dialogue: To Make the World Prettier.
translated_dialogue: เพื่อทำให้โลกสวยงาม

Sometimes you can use CLAIRVOYANCE on an object to see from the point of view of the owner. Just hold the item in your hand and use the CLAIRVOYANCE power. Items that have strong clairvoyance reaction will appear with a special aura in your inventory, like this: /ClairvoyanceEye/
